name: Rootin' Tootin' (Demo)
description:
*WARNING*

This game is just a DEMO. Full Game Release Date TBA! 

Travel through Time and help the Rootin' Tootin' Cowboy stop all the Escaped Prisoners! Have your Shootin' Iron on hand to fire down the Yellow Belly Prisoners. Don't forget to Collect all the Sheriff Badges! This challenging Platformer is great for Speed Running!
